directions: Spread a thin layer of cream cheese on 4 slices of bread. Top the cream cheese with a slice of Havarti cheese, then a thin layer of apple slices. Place the remaining slices of bread on top to form 4 sandwiches.
Using 2 diagonal cuts, divide each sandwich into 4 triangles.
ingredients: 1 large Granny Smith apple, cored and thinly sliced
title: Cinnamon Apple and Havarti Tea Sandwiches
